scripts.build: pnpm manifest:local && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:opsep: pnpm manifest:opsep && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbsep: pnpm manifest:arbsep && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.build:ethsep: pnpm manifest:ethsep && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:local: pnpm manifest:local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 kamikazebr/gv2 -l v0.0.3
scripts.deploy:arbsep: pnpm auth:dev && pnpm manifest:arbsep && graph deploy --studio gardens-v2---arbitrum-sepolia
scripts.deploy:ethsep: pnpm auth:dev && pnpm manifest:ethsep && graph deploy --studio gv2-ethsepolia
scripts.deploy:prod: export SUB_PROD_VERSION=0.1.22 && pnpm deploy:arbitrum -l $SUB_PROD_VERSION && pnpm deploy:optimism -l $SUB_PROD_VERSION && pnpm deploy:matic -l $SUB_PROD_VERSION && pnpm deploy:gnosis -l $SUB_PROD_VERSION && pnpm deploy:base -l $SUB_PROD_VERSION && pnpm deploy:celo -l $SUB_PROD_VERSION
scripts.local: pnpm create-local && pnpm build && pnpm deploy:local
scripts.proxies:test: node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs arbsepolia && node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs opsepolia
scripts.proxies:prod: node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs arbitrum && node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs optimism && node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs polygon && node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs gnosis && node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs base && node src/scripts/list-proxies.cjs celo
scripts.build-all: pnpm create-local && pnpm build && pnpm deploy:local
